synopsis: In this engaging episode of Pineapple Blunt Rotation, hosts Devam and Ahir, alongside special guest Garrett, dive into the complex topics of body image and the gym. They share personal experiences, challenge societal beauty standards, and emphasize the importance of self-acceptance and enjoying the process of fitness, all while maintaining a lighthearted and humorous tone.
quotes: The horror is persistent, but so do we.
You have to get into the thick of it to get out again.
If you're going to the gym to improve the way you look, you should also be going to the gym because it's something you enjoy.
Comparison is the thief of joy.
If you want to make a change, you have to love the body you have right now.
It's important to not hyper-fixate on minor insecurities.
Drink water, guys. If you didn't take anything else away from this episode, drink more water.
You shouldn't look at a fitness influencer and say, 'I should be looking like that.'
Everyone has dealt with the same thoughts at some point.
